167128.「恵みの木の中に こんな世界があるなんて\n いったい どうなってるの！？:
What is going ON with this weird place
inside the tree?!

167129.「ねぇ <pc>さん。\n これって 絶対 ヘンだよ！:
Right, <pc>?
Isn't this all so weird?!

167130.「でも…… もしかして ここを調べれば\n あたしにだけ聞こえる ふしぎな声の手:
But...maybe if I check this place out, I
might be able to find out more about that
voice I keep hearing, don't you think?

167132.「あれ <pc>！？\n どうして キミが こんな所に？:
What?! <pc>?!
What are you doing here?!

167134.「手に持ってる その本 なーに？: What's that book you've got there?

167135.「……どうしてか わからないけれど\n あたし その本が すごく気になる……。:
I don't really know why, but...suddenly I'm
really interested with what's inside that
book...

167138.「あっ。リルチェラ！\n キミの その肩のところ……:
Oh, Lilcherat! There's something on your
shoulder...

167139.「やっと 皆さんに 声が届くようになりました。\n いやはや ここまで 長い道の:
Looks like I was finally able to get all of
your attention. It was quite the arduous
journey to get here.

167140.「えっ えっ！？\n なになに？ どういうこと？: H-huh?! What is that?! What do you mean?

167141.「申し遅れましたが 私 \n 花の民プクリポを創りたまいし神\n ピナヘトの神獣:
My apologies...my name is Sinaridi. I am the
divine beast of the god Pinaheto, the one
who created all Pukulipos.

167142.「氷の領界を 守護し\n 緑の者と ゆかりが深い\n 神獣とでも 言えばいいでし:
I am the divine beast who protects the Ice
Realm, and am closely linked to the Green
Thumb.

167143.「……リルチェラ。あなたが 恵みの木を治すため\n 緑の者として 覚醒した時のこ:
Lilcherat...you remember when you awakened
as the Green Thumb to heal the Tree of Grace,
do you not?

167144.「あの時 あなたに 呼びかけたのは\n 私の声だったのです。あれ以来 ずっと\n:
It was my voice who had called out to you.
Ever since then, I have been by your side,
watching you quite closely.

167146.「……無理もないことです。恵みの木が\n 凍りついた際に 私のチカラも弱まってし:
That's no surprise... When the Tree of Grace
had frozen over, I lost much of my strength.
Most of my time was spent recovering.

167147.「そして 今 あなたたちが 停滞していた\n この世界の流れを活性化させたことで:
And now that you have revitalized the stagnant
currents of this world, I have finally
regained my original strength.

167148.「えーと。つまり 氷の領界の神獣であるキミが\n リルチェラに 呼びかけて\n:
So let me get this straight...as the Ice
Realm's divine beast, you led Lilcherat to
this place and this book on purpose.

167149.「それは ボクたちが追ってきた\n 万象流転の書 そのものが\n アストルティア:
...and that's because this Book of All Things
is the will of all the gods of Astoltia.

167150.「はい。お気づきの通り この 万象流転の書には\n それぞれの領界を 見守ってき:
Yes. As you are already well aware, that book
contains the power of each realm that the
race gods had watched over.

167151.「本来ならば 神々の導きにしたがって\n ナドラガンドに 救いをもたらすのは\n:
As the divine beast entrusted with this book,
it has always been my role to bring salvation
to Nadragand as guided by the gods.

167152.「しかし 邪悪なる意志と名乗る者に\n チカラを奪われた 私は\n 他の誰かに:
But the one who called themselves the Evil
Will took my power, and I had no choice to
leave that role to someone else...

167153.「巻き込むような形とはいえ リルチェラや\n <pc>さん サジェさんの協力のお:
Although it was not easy, it is thanks to the
three of you that my mission was able to
be fulfilled.

167154.「そのことには 深く感謝しております。\n ですから どうか 私からの お礼を\:
And for that, I am deeply grateful...
Please, I ask that you accept my deepest
thanks.

167155.「この シナリディ秘蔵のとっておき……\n きっと 気に入っていただけると 思い:
This is a special treasure of mine... I am
certain that you will be pleased with it!

167156.「じゃあ それは <pc>さんに あげて。\n １番 がんばってくれたのは\n:
Well, give it to <pc>, then! <if_woman>She's<else>He's<endif>
the one that did most of the work!

167158.「ああ。ボクも そう言おうと 思っていた。\n ボクは ただ 自分の知的好奇心の:
Yeah, I had the same idea. All of this was
merely just to follow my intellectual
curiosity anyways.

167159.「それに 当初の ボクの目的だった\n 闇の領界の環境を よくするということは\:
Besides, I can say that my original goal of
improving the Dark Realm's environment has
has been fulfilled, can't I?

167160.「うん。あたしも 竜族の世界が\n よくなっていくのを見てると うれしかった。\:
Yeah. Seeing the Nadravian's world getting
better and better again...
That's the best reward of all...

167161.「竜族のみんなが 幸せになるために\n 少しでも あたしたちが 役に立てたなら\:
If there's anything we can do to make our
people happy, then that's all that matters.

167163.「わかりました。では 私からのお礼は\n あとで 私に話しかけて お受け取りくだ:
I understand. You may accept my thanks by
speaking with me again whenever you wish. I
will be waiting on the tablet there.

167164.「あー。でもね……。\n いっこだけ ある……かも。\n あたしの ほしいもの。:
Ah, actually...there is one thing...
There is something that I want.

167165.「このまま サジェくんと会えなくなっちゃうのは\n その…… さみしいかなって…:
It would be pretty lonely if I couldn't be
with you anymore, Sajay... So from now on,
I was hoping that I could...

167166.「会えるよ いつだって。\n <pc>が ５つの領界を\n つないでくれたんだか:
Don't worry, we'll see each other.
<pc> helped to connect the realms
together, so we can any time you want.

167167.「本当！？\n それならまた あたしと一緒に 遊んでくれる？: Really?! So you'll play with me again, right?

167168.「……まぁ。遊ぶかどうかは ともかくとして\n 会いたいなら 会えばいいと ボク:
Well...whether or not we play, I think if you
want to see me, then you should. What's
there to hesitate about?

167169.「よかったぁ。あたし この本の調査が\n 全部 終わっちゃったら サジェくんと\:
Whew...I'm so glad. Here I was thinking that
after we finished researching that book, I'd
have to say goodbye to you...

167170.「それじゃあさ！ これからも ふたりで\n 竜族の世界を もっと よくする方法を:
So! Why don't we keep thinking of other ways
that we can help to make this world a better
place to live?

167171.「そんなふうに サジェくんと\n ずっと ずーっと 一緒に過ごしていけたら\n:
I think it would be so, so great if I could
always be with you doing things like that!
Right? Promise?!

167172.「ずっとって それ……\n 本気で ずっと？:
Always be with me...?
You're serious? Always...?

167173.「キミが そう言うなら…… \n ボクも……まぁ いいけど……。:
Well, if you say so... I suppose that's okay,
but...

167174.「ふふっ。こんな 子供たちが これからの\n 竜族の未来を になっていくのなら…:
Hmm hmm...if children such as these are the
future of the Nadravians...then I suppose I
have nothing to worry about, do I?

167175.「<pc>さん。ありがとうございます。\n あなたのおかげで この世界は\n 新:
Thank you, <pc>. Because of your
help, this world has a very bright future
ahead of it.

167260.「どうか あの子たちが作っていく 竜族の世界が\n 明るく あたたかなもので あ:
May the world that those children build be
filled with light and warmth... I, too, will
do everything in my power to watch over them.
